About Us

Pleasant Painting LLC is a licensed, insured, and family-owned professional residential and commercial painting company based in West Palm Beach, Florida.

We pride ourselves on our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. Our team of skilled painters is dedicated to providing top-notch services, ensuring your property looks its best.
